sentences.sContent: It is unclear how this fits with Mr Obama's oft-repeated pledges to bring a "new tone" to Washington, reach out to Republicans and work to end partisanship and incivility.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is unclear how this fits with Mr Obama's oft-repeated pledges to bring a "new tone" to Washington, reach out to Republicans and work to end partisanship and incivility.
sentences.sCn: 奥巴马一再保证要给华盛顿带来“新风格”，与共和党人展开合作，并努力结束党争和粗鲁。 然而他的言语不实该如何同他这些多次重复的承诺协调一致呢？

sentences.sContent: Does anyone doubt that we live in an age of incivility , of distrust of other cultures?
sentences.sContent_eng: Does anyone doubt that we live in an age of incivility , of distrust of other cultures?
sentences.sCn: 有人怀疑过我们处在一种粗野、不信任其他文化的时代里？
